text: 9.13: Wkp 16.3; 16.14-16; Nam 19.9; 19.17-19; Hi 10.4Maaŋ muuŋgip, gumgi gu mbigi Fhe Bakɨme nɨman nzaŋnzaŋgirga, Fhe Bakɨme rotu gari gumgi, mbe meme vɨzɨnan mba gumgi gu mbigi buui o, mbe borombaga pura vɨzɨnan mbe buui o, mbe vhɨra borombaga meen ga pooŋgip, anan vherɨna ndigap, anan mbe buui. Mbe mba tɨvar muuŋgirga, mba fhum Fhe Bakɨme nɨman nzaŋnzaŋgi gumgi gu mbigi, mbe Fhe Bakɨme nɨman taagiap ŋgarigi.
